amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for administrative expenses to carry out the direct and guaranteed loan programs under the Small Business Act by $40 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds (by offset) for the direct and guaranteed loan programs by $40,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 327).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 327).
